welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Newport Pagnell, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its rich history and quaint streets, we invite you to explore and discover the beauty of this hidden gem. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Northampton Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport serves mainly low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
